CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 9, 1947, pg. 28, reads: "FROG Week Golf Tourney is Tops - The ranking golfers in the country turned up here this week to play in The Pittsburgh Courier - Yorkshire gold tournament at South Park. Among the many visitors were, left to right: Bill Robinson and Joe Louis in a little tom-foolery before the famous fighter went out to compete in the amateur division. Marion Mallory of Philadelphia and Mrs. Joe Louis were among the many women who followed their husbands around the course, and Judson Grant, 51-year-old star who came through with a 70 on the first day. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Bill "Bojangles" Robinson and Joe Louis with golf club at South Park golf course for Tournament of Champions
CatSubject_tab: Louis, Joe, 1914-Robinson, Bill, 1878-1949.Men--Pennsylvania--South Park.Golf--Pennsylvania--South Park.Allegheny County (Pa.).Department of Parks, Recreation, and Conservation.South Park.
